name: Snowbound Days With Ralph
description:
The game's story revolves around Eira, a witch who manages a magical potion shop called the "Green Cottage." In the midst of an unexpected snowstorm, she, along with the dashing canine butler Ralph, embarks on a journey to fulfill an "urgent commission." Players have five days to complete this mission and, at the same time, immerse themselves in interactive experiences with Ralph and other characters.

What sets this game apart from most adult-oriented games is the unique dynamic. As the player takes on the role of Eira, the once-feared "Potion Queen," and with the charming Ralph as your butler, you naturally hold the reins. How you choose to wield this control to find enjoyment is left for players to explore.

● Concise Main Objective with a Complex and Varied Storyline
The primary objective of the game is to complete an alchemical crafting commission within a set time limit. However, the game offers more than this; all the characters featured in the game have their own stories and encounters, waiting for players to explore.


● Diverse Mini-Games and Collectible Materials
As the owner of the "Green Cottage," you can obtain materials by playing entertaining mini-games in different scenes. Try to achieve high scores in these games! Not only can they trigger more intriguing plotlines, but they will also help you craft the potions required for your tasks.


● Freedom to Pursue and Create Memories with Various Characters
The game features numerous characters, such as "Canine Butler Ralph," "Traveling Merchant Helgi," "Student Chiron," and unique "Assistant Dolls." Each character has their own background or story with Eira. During these five days, you can decide which relationships to nurture or deepen, crafting "inexpressible" and "beautiful memories" along the way.
